entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:08 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kirkland Lake 1:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 34 %
Dewpoint: -11.1°C
Wind: ESE 16 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
